titleStmt.title: The declaration of James Duke of Hammiltoun and Chastellerhault, Marquesse of Cliddisdale, &c. Lord Generall and Commander in Chief of all the Scots forces by sea and land.
titleStmt.author: Hamilton, James Hamilton, Duke of, 1606-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given under my hand at Kirkbisthure, the 22. day of July 1648.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
